title: Lattice-Field Medium: Complete Electromagnetic Theory Validation

creators.name: Partin, Greg D.
creators.affiliation: LFM Research, Los Angeles CA USA

description: Validation of electromagnetic theory within the Lattice-Field Medium framework, demonstrating emergence of Maxwell equations from discrete spacetime dynamics. See RESULTS_COMPREHENSIVE.md for current pass rates across tiers, including Tier 5 electromagnetic validations covering Coulomb's law, Lorentz force, electromagnetic wave propagation, and rainbow lensing phenomena.
